summary: a common working diagnosis system involves identifying PEDV-infected animals individually, which is a costly and time-consuming approach. we developed a real-time fluorescent reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification (RtF-RT-LAMP) assay and establish a pooled testing system using faecal sample to identify PEDV-infected herd. 10.1 and JN089738.1), the sequence of G1b S INDEL strain (KY619833.1), the sequence of G2a/Non S INDEL/North America strain (KY619838.1), the sequence of NK96P4C6 G1a classical strain (KY619828).
